parameters: \coHere he is. Caught him skulking around town right
after the Greenfield incident. Kept muttering
\coGood luck getting anything out of him.
\p3True... but what if he's hiding something?
\p3Hey, you... can you tell us anything about \c[18]Apocalypse\c[0]?
\p3Yeah, that's... kinda' the point of our question.
\-You're already too late. The walls bleed and no one
\-My identity has been forsaken. I exist only
to serve \c[30]the highest power there is\c[0].
\p2What, are you a cult member or something?
\-No. We are simply devoted to our cause. We will fight alongside
\c[18]Apocalypse\c[0] to bring the Overworld to its knees. Then
we will rule alongside \c[18]him\c[0] in the new world!
all of you! \c[18]He\c[0] doesn't differentiate when it
comes to humans... none of us will be spared.
\p4Yeah, stop with the crazy talk and give us
some real info! What's your group called?
\-Haha... better to die than displease the \c[30]Purple\c[0].
\-You think I'm afraid of you? No... I'm afraid of \fithem\fr.
\coThere's a problem outside! A couple guys and some...
weird purple things walked into town and went
straight for the jail. When we tried to talk
to them, they immediately attacked us!
\coDoes this have anything to do with you? Trying
to pull off some sort of prison break?
\-You will all perish by the hands of the Order of the \c[30]Purple\c[0].
\coThis guy is useless... let's get out of here and save our people!
\chiefNot at all. They weren't trying to rescue
their comrade... they were trying to
\coLooks like that stubborn loyalty didn't mean much to them.
\p3Damn it. He was our only lead.
you might want to check this out.
\coThe assassin who killed him dropped this on his way
out. It's covered in blood and some weird slime, but
I'd recognize the symbol on the top from anywhere.
\coBefore I joined the military, I worked for Telluria Castle Town's sewage department.
Terrible job, awful pay... but this is undoubtedly a key to the very same sewers.
\p2Okay... but why would an elite assassin who's part
of a doomsday cult be carrying a sewer key?
\chiefIf I had to guess, the Order's base of operations is within
the Castle Town Sewers. It's the perfect spot, really. Get
deep enough, and no one's ever going to find you.
\chiefYou four should head back to Telluria Castle Town. Look
around for a well or something, I'm sure you'll be
able to find an entrance to the sewers.
\ctoadYou're making a big mistake keeping us in here...
we'll be free soon enough, and you're going to
\chiefWhy don't you four go in first? We've haven't gotten
anything out of him, but you might fare better.
like I said, this guy is weird.
\knightDon't worry, he's not dangerous. THose cuffs he's
got on are restricting the flow of his mana.
